possibility of extended customization: customizable HTML based templates  custom comment tags

generated diagrams: caller and callee graphs  dependency graphs  inheritance diagrams  collaboration diagrams

possibility of extended customization: Custom headers  footers  code coloring  and other CSS styles in individual pages. Project-wide TOC is generated from a user-defined template.
highlighting and linking of generated do: Configurable syntax highlighting/coloring with automatic linking to symbols in declaration  ability to manually link to symbols in discussion  etc.
parameter types extracted: Provides warnings if tagged parameters do not match code  parsed parameters included in XML output and Doxygen-style tagfile (-D flag in 8.7). Partial C preprocessor support with -p flag. Support for #if/#ifdef control over documentation inclusion using the -D and -U command-line flags.

possibility of extended customization: customizable through style sheets and CSS
generated diagrams: linked hierarchy and dependency graphs for function calls  variable sets and reads  class inheritance and interface  and file includes and interface  intra-function flow charts

parameter types extracted: full semantic analysis of source code  including parameter types  conditional compilation directives  macro expansions

possibility of extended customization: Customisable for all type of comments
highlighting and linking of generated do: all general documentation; references  manual  organigrams  ... Including the binary codes included in the comments.
